content: get ready to crochet your very own adorable turkey squish with this easy-to-follow pattern perfect for beginners this 3d sphere pattern is worked in the round and includes a written pattern with a helpful video tutorial create a cute and cuddly turkey measuring approximately 10 inches across/tall excluding feet and feathers using super bulky bernat blanket yarn you ll love how quickly this project comes together **unique features-** easy-to-follow written pattern for beginners crochet in the round helpful video tutorial included for extra guidance **materials needed-** us-l 8 0 mm hook **susan bates** https //amzn to/3hq2sp9 340 yds **bernat blanket** https //amzn to/3uxj0b4 6 - super bulky **10 microbead pillow ball** https //amzn to/3zqefkm or fiberfill **2 safety eyes - 24mm** https //amzn to/3nmgxkp **stitch markers** https //amzn to/3tyhdg4
